long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sirch is a new search platform which offers the following: get to any tab, any domain, or any results instantly.
- Press Command/Control/Shift + K to activate a search bar, then type anything to search.
- Press Esc to exit. 
- Please note: this extension is built for keyboard use only.

Version 1.1:
- You can now see all the pages within some domains, such as homedepot.com
- You can now upvote any result as you flip, by pressing the UP arrow key

Version 1.2
- You can now see short Answers right under your search bar.

Version 1.3
- You can now press Enter to Stash any page. 
- You can see Stashed pages under domains.
- You can see how many people stashed each search result.

Version 1.4
- We no longer open 147 tabs in the cloud every time you search. That was a hard fix!
